candidate_text:
**"The Great Epstein Freakshow: A Grotesque Carnival of Power and Depravity"**

By Hunter S. Thompson,

Gonzo Journalism Headquarters,

Woody Creek, CO

August 2019

I was sipping on a cold one, surrounded by the majestic Rockies, when the news hit me like a shot of adrenaline straight into the mainline: Jeffrey Epstein,'t dead!

**THE GREAT EPSTEIN ESCAPE: A TALE OF POWER, and PERVERSION**

Well, the hell, (or at least the high-end hellhole of Palm Beach), it seems that Jeffrey Epstein has finally gone and gotten himself killed in the most ignominious way possible - or so they say.
I'll believe it when I see it, done up in a velvet-lined casket with a bullet hole in the temple,2013 style.
But I'm not buying it, (yet).
This whole thing stinks worse than a Rio Grande dumpster fire on a hot summer night.
You see, I've been around the block a few times, of late, and something smells fishier than a bucket of rotten grouper on this one.
This is America, Bubbles, a country where the rich get richer and the poor get...well, you know.
You see,  **I know a thing or two about the dark underbelly of the American Dream**, and this whole damn story stinks like last week's rotting fish on the Miami docks.
You see,  _they_ want you to believe he offed himself in that fetid little cell on Rikers Island, a pathetic,'to-the-manor-born' exit for the King of Pedophile's Paradise.
This whole damn thing stinks like last week's trash on the streets of Manhattan.
You see, my friends, is the king of doublespeak, a virtuoso of perversion and deception.
See,  this cat was a master of manipulation, A Svengali of slimeballs,'they said he could make the guilty look innocent and the innocent look like they'd just robbed a bank.
Now I know what you're thinking. "
Now, I know what you're thinking - "Hunter, why should we give a damn about some degenerate billionaire pedophile?"
Now, I know what you're thinking: "Hunter, why the hell should we care about some billionaire perv getting offed?"

But let me tell you, this is no ordinary suicide-by-hanging-in-a-prison-cell story (and don't even get me started on those pesky CCTV cameras that just happened to malfunction at the exact moment of his demise) No sir,thisisamysterywrappedinaenigma...andIaimtounravelit.
Now I know what you're thinking - "Hunter,'this guy's a total creep!"
Now I know what you're thinking "Hunter,'this is all just a bunch of speculation", and you're damn right it is!
But let me tell you something my friend, when it comes to the likes of Epstein,the line between fact and fiction gets blurred faster than a Vegas bookie can lay off a bet on a longshot.
Because when it comes to Epstein, everybody's got an opinion but nobody knows squat about what really went down.
But I've got a gut feeling about this one, folks, that something ain't quite right.
Maybe it's because I've seen some of the darkest corners of human depravity in my day, but there's something about this whole Epstein deal that reeks of cover-up.
I mean, you don't get to where Epstein got by being a choirboy,'the man had connections that went higher than the Burj Khalifa.
You see Epstein had connections to some of the most powerful people on this good green earth of ours - princes, (literally) presidents (no less than three), billionaires (you get the idea).
They say he hanged himself with a bedsheet in his cell?
This was a guy who had more lives than a cat has lives (which as we know, is nine, but Epstein seemed to have about twenty-seven).

Maybe it's because I've spent my fair share of time chasing the white rabbit down the hole of American madness, maybe it's because I've seen some stuff that'll make your hair stand on end...but I think there's more to this story than meets the eye.

The man had connections, oh boy did he ever...from the Royal Family to the Clintons (and let's not forget that infamous "Lolita Express" - yeah,that's a real thing) this guy was swimming in the deep end with the big boys.
